alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Randolph (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:34PM CDT until March 27 at 6:13AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Spring River At Imboden affecting Randolph and Lawrence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Spring River At Imboden. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lower lying cultivated farmlands and pastures flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 18.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 7.0 feet Thursday evening, March 30. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date Spring River Imboden 18.0 18.9 Sat 8 PM 13.3 8.1 7.4 *FALLING* &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
